update supplier
supplier_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_address = #{supplierAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update supplier set supplier_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_address = #{supplierAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_kind = #{supplierKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_phone = #{supplierPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_card = #{supplierCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_kind = #{cardKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

supplier_name like concat("%",#{supplierName},"%")
